Member.Name: element:TypeId
Member.Documentation: Must be an existing ObjectBuilder type that exists in the game code. WARNING: To avoid issues do not change a definition's TypeId. Instead copy a full definition from vanilla sbc, of the new type you need. The "MyObjectBuilder_" prefix is optional.

Member.Name: attribute:Type
Member.Documentation: Must be an existing ObjectBuilder type that exists in the game code. WARNING: To avoid issues do not change a definition's TypeId. Instead copy a full definition from vanilla sbc, of the new type you need. The "MyObjectBuilder_" prefix is optional.

Member.Name: element:SubtypeId
Member.Documentation: A made up name that represents half of the identifier for this definition. Subtypes are only unique per TypeId, they do not collide/override over different TypeIds. Empty value is also a valid value.

Member.Name: attribute:Subtype
Member.Documentation: A made up name that represents half of the identifier for this definition. Subtypes are only unique per TypeId, they do not collide/override over different TypeIds. Empty value is also a valid value.
